metadata.Title: CVE-2020-18774 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A float point exception in the printLong function in tags_int.cpp of Exiv2 0.27.99.0 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via a crafted tif file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> doesn't appear to be a fix from upstream as of 2023-09-15

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-09-15').
